channel.title: Comments for page "The Kaleidoscope Eye"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Kaleidoscope Eye"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
That means they can't be bingo'd by anyone except if the bingo'er has the respective counter ally.

J-diddy for Rayne
Emosuke(any level) for Touchy
Pinky(any level) for GMP

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: What do the UnBingoable team bonuses actually do? Do that mean you can't be tracked by other ninja or does it mean no matter how well your enemy does in battle, you will never lose a bingo fight against them?
